text: The Temple of Eck in 2019 The Temple of Eck is the center of the Eckankar faith in the United States. It was built at a cost of $8.2 million. The building was completed in Chanhassen, Minnesota in 1990. It is located near Lake Ann on about of land which the church bought in 1985. ==References== Category:Religious buildings and structures in Minnesota Category:Religious buildings and structures completed in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in Minnesota Category:Chanhassen, Minnesota
title: Temple of Eck
